thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 2 de 684
thread.title: Juan

author: Juan
title: Juan
text: I like the staff at Goldcar, always polite and friendly. Great website and easy to navigate. Prices are competitive and good value for money. I've not given 5* as sometimes the cars can be a bit run down, but always felt safe driving them. As a Spaniard who lives and works in London but travels to Alicante very often, I have used Goldcar for over 10 years and have found them to be very reasonable and if I ever had a dispute Goldcar's staff went out of their way to resolve it swiftly. Good recommend to anyone! Thanks
